ENGLISH: \c[1]But now, \n[8] faces the Followers of Zanatus, who seem to have far-reaching power and influence.

ENGLISH: \c[1]It seems that \n[8]'s moment of rest will not last long, as the enemy has seen fit to call for reinforcements of its own...
